summary:
Strong understanding of the IT environment terms and Handled the “Full Life Cycle” Recruiting process for Information Technology skilled candidates by Sourcing through various internet job boards such as Naukri, Monster, Dice, and CareerBuilder.

•	Develop knowledge of recruitment best practice, Account Management and Consultancy
•	Monitoring recruitment process identifying and recommending areas for improvement
•	Maintain all databases, management reports and documentation in an accurate and timely manner
•	Develop and maintain relationships with new and existing internal clients to ensure compliance and expand areas of service delivery
•	Work to defined processes, ensuring best practice at all times
•	Work within predefined recruitment processes, ensuring best practice at all times
•	Work with a sourcing team to ensure quality supply\
•	Responsible for all aspects of Recruiting, with Direct Clients and major Tier 1 vendors & other major responsibilities included marketing of own H1b consultants to Direct clients and major Tier 1 vendor as per the client requirements.
•	Extensive experience in recruiting and marketing of GC/ US Citizens/ TN/ EAD/H1/OPT’s, Extensive experience in recruiting for (Contract/Contract to Hire/Perm) positions.
•	Responsible of Marketing H1B bench resources ensuring minimum or no candidate remains on bench, engaging the Bench resource to ensure proper positioning for upcoming requirements and ensure better selection rate
•	Sourced and recruited IT professionals within a wide range of skills, technologies and disciplines to include but not limited to: Java/J2EE Developers & Architects, ETL Tools, Oracle Developers & DBA both Functional and Technical, SAP Modules (MM, FI/CO, BW, Portal, Netwear SD, Tester etc.,), and Teamcenter. PLM Consultants, QA, People soft QA, Business Analyst, Project Managers, .NET, Siebel Developers, Weblogic, Websphere, Unix Admin Teamcenter Admin-Developer, Cisco Engineer Citrix System Administrator etc...
•	Strong working experience with Social business networking sites such as LinkedIn, Twitter and Facebook. And many more user groups like Google, Yahoo MSN.
•	Creative, proactive and self-directed professional with the ability to interact with all levels of management
•	Strong interpersonal and communication skills, creativity, excellent attitude towards teamwork and common goals achievement.

profile_positions.description:
Innova Solutions is a global information technology company combining a global reach with a local touch. Headquartered in Duluth, Georgia and part of ACS solutions, Innova employs more than 20000+ technology professionals worldwide, with field offices in New York, Noida, Chennai, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Pune, and Taipei. From Cloud Transformation to Data Services to Managed IT Operations, Innova provides a broad array of proven, tested, cost‑effective and enterprise‑scale technologies and services that leverage latest technology and delivery models to deliver high value in the cloud, in the data center, and across complex inter‑connected environments.

Our Value to an organization is about Embracing, Advancing and Accelerating
• Demonstrating ongoing Business Value for IT Services
• Cloud Adoption (without "single source"​ lock-in)
• Accelerating the Business with Analytic and Big Data Management Services
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
Newforce Global Services is a London Registered Global Service Provider having customers across developed Global markets United States, Canada, UK, Europe, Australia, New Zealand,Middle East, Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia.

Newforce Global Services Provide services in Education, Consulting And Sun contracting segments at most affordable price by using a mix of right shore & offshoring experts. Currently Newforce have around 20000+ Experts in 800+ skills helping customer Globally.

Consulting Services : IT Infrastructure, IT Consulting, business change, project management and senior appointments in a multi sector environment supporting clients in their business growth.. 

Sub Contracting Services : We source the best permanent or Contract candidates available in the market to give our clients the competitive edge required to achieve their goals. Our clients benefit from our commitment to quality and unparalleled knowledge and expertise. Supporting Resources and companies in their growth.
profile_positions.title: Resources Manager

profile_positions.description:
At SPAR, we deliver enterprise-class solutions in big data, data warehouse and BI, and master data management to enable your data-driven decision prowess. Our exemplary talent acquisition services bring global expertise to your business projects while our software development services (application development, mobility and testing and QA) ensure seamless and effective functioning of your business processes/projects.

SPAR headquarters in Dallas,Texas and three development centers in India (Pune, Hyderabad and Noida) are ready to deliver success on your next project! If you win, we win too! 

SPAR has imbibed innovation and solution thinking in its culture. Every SPARtan (seen the movie 300?) is the “Chosen One” (selected from the best professional and educational backgrounds). They are not just technical experts delivering world class solutions on projects but with a personal touch. They come from diverse cultural, global backgrounds but give them an objective and they will turn into a wonderful cohesive unit of battle ready warriors.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Technical Recruiter

profile_positions.description:
At AXIUS we deliver a measurable output in productivity, profitability, and shareholder value to the world’s leading companies. Our Methodology enables clients to lower the total cost of ownership and meet their business objectives.

Managed by a team of dynamic and task-oriented IT professionals, AXIUS Technologies brings a pragmatic approach with proven, real-world solutions to the challenging fields of technology and IT personnel placement.

Axius Technologies is dedicated to maintaining the highest level of customer satisfaction and to offering our customers with first class services. To achieve these, we have a team of well-qualified, experienced and energetic employees who cover all aspects of technology, including Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), customer relationship management (CRM), Systems, Applications and Products (SAP), project management, Network engineering, Database management and systems administration, Data warehousing , Web technologies, quality assurance (QA) and engineering.
profile_positions.title: US IT RECRUITER

volunteer_experiences.description:
Vatsalyam Voluntary Organization started social welfare activities to support people who are in needy and orphans,blind and physically challenged people for better societs.
join wit us............. let us change the society......
The journey of VATSALYAM VOLUNTARY ORGANISATION was started, by a zealous band of youth volunteers on 27th of november2007.Today, maximum full time workers, hundreds of volunteers, thousands of well wishers form the vatsalyam family. The NGO was formally registered in 2010 at Hyderabad & currently working in all the slum areas and helping the poor and the needy with the assistance of students from various colleges and also people who are interested in social service.
